2022.3.62f3 Release Notes
Fixes
- UI Elements: Fixed a bug where some serialized fields were not always displayed in the inspector. (UUM-103578)
- Physics 2D: Fix memory leak when reporting 2D physics collision callbacks. (UUM-108093)
